description: A valued accessory for improving vitality.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 135 health, 0.75 health regen, 0.6% magic resistance and 6 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 108 health, 0.6 health regen and 0.48% magic resistance.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 108 health, 0.6 health regen and 0.48% magic resistance.
